title: Smart Placement Ecosystem – Responsive Landing Page

requirements.text: Build a sticky responsive Navbar with the 'Smart Placement Ecosystem' logo, navigation links (Home, About, How It Works, Contact), Login and Register buttons, a mobile hamburger menu toggle, and a background color change on scroll.

quotes: Navigation links: Home, About, How It Works, Contact

acceptanceCriteria: Navbar sticks to the top of the viewport on scroll
Navbar background changes visually when user scrolls down
Hamburger menu appears on small screens and toggles the nav links
Logo text 'Smart Placement Ecosystem' is visible in the navbar
Login and Register buttons are visible on desktop and accessible from the mobile menu

requirements.text: Build a Hero Section with the headline 'AI-Powered Smart Placement Platform', a short descriptive subtitle explaining the platform's purpose, and two call-to-action buttons: 'Get Started' and 'Login'.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the headline 'AI-Powered Smart Placement Platform' prominently
A short subtitle paragraph is visible below the headline
Two CTA buttons ('Get Started' and 'Login') are displayed and styled consistently with the theme

requirements.text: Build an About Section that explains the problem with traditional placement systems, how the AI-based system improves job matching, and why it is useful for both students and recruiters.

quotes: The problem with traditional placement systems
How this AI-based system improves job matching
Why it is useful for students and recruiters

acceptanceCriteria: About section contains a heading and descriptive content covering the three listed points
Content is readable and well-structured with appropriate spacing

requirements.text: Build a 'How It Works' Section displaying 4 sequential steps as cards: (1) Student uploads resume, (2) AI analyzes skills, (3) System matches relevant jobs, (4) Recruiter shortlists candidates. Each step should have a step number, icon or visual indicator, title, and short description.
acceptanceCriteria: Four step cards are displayed in order
Each card shows a step number, title, and short description
Cards are arranged horizontally on desktop and stack vertically on mobile

requirements.text: Build a Statistics Section displaying four static platform metrics: total number of students, number of partner companies, total applications submitted, and placement success rate. Display these as visually prominent stat cards.
acceptanceCriteria: Four stat cards are displayed with a label and a static number each
Cards are responsive and wrap on smaller screens
Numbers are visually prominent (large font size)

requirements.text: Build a Contact Section with a section heading, a brief contact invite message, and basic contact details (email address and/or a simple contact form placeholder).

quotes: Navigation links: Home, About, How It Works, Contact

acceptanceCriteria: Contact section is reachable via the 'Contact' nav link anchor
Section displays at minimum a heading and contact information or a placeholder form

requirements.text: Build a Footer with quick navigation links (Home, About, How It Works, Contact), basic contact information, and the 'Smart Placement Ecosystem' brand name.
acceptanceCriteria: Footer displays quick links that scroll to the respective sections
Footer includes contact information
Brand name is visible in the footer

requirements.text: Ensure the entire landing page is fully responsive: the navbar collapses to a hamburger menu on mobile, all sections stack vertically on small screens, and text, buttons, and cards adapt appropriately to desktop, tablet, and mobile breakpoints using Tailwind CSS responsive utilities.

quotes: Navbar converts into hamburger menu on small screens
Layout works on desktop, tablet, and mobile

acceptanceCriteria: All sections are usable and readable at mobile viewport widths (< 640px)
Navbar hamburger menu works correctly on small screens
No horizontal overflow on any screen size

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive modern SaaS visual theme with a dark-to-rich gradient palette (e.g., deep navy to teal or dark slate to emerald), clean typography, generous spacing, card-based component structure, and subtle gradient accents on buttons and section backgrounds. The design should feel appropriate for an AI-powered enterprise platform.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent color palette and gradient theme is applied across all sections
Typography hierarchy is clear (headings, subheadings, body text)
Buttons use gradient or themed styling consistent with the overall design
Card components have consistent border-radius, shadow, and padding

requirements.text: Render the generated hero background image and logo as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in the Hero Section and Navbar respectively.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the generated background image
Navbar displays the generated logo image

constraints: All landing page sections must be single-page with anchor-based navigation (no routing required for the landing page itself)
Statistics values are static — do not connect them to a backend data source at this stage
Do not edit any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Machine learning or AI feature implementation

required: Abstract AI neural network dark gradient hero background with glowing teal and cyan node connections on a deep navy background (hero-bg.dim_1440x800.png)
Minimal flat logo mark for 'Smart Placement Ecosystem' — a stylized 'S' or abstract node-graph icon in teal and white on transparent background (spe-logo.dim_128x128.png)
